text: Bathibakufikelwanokubayintoninaenxulumenenokhuseleko okanye uloyiko, bayibhengeze (eluntwini lonke); kanti ukuba bebenokuyazisa uMthunywa okanye (bayazise) abo balawulayo phakathi kwabo, abaphandi bokwenene bebeza kuyiqonda (kakuhle) kubo. Ukuba bekungekho ngenxa yenceba ka-Allâh kuni, ninge nilandele uShaytân ngaphandle kwabambalwa kuni
